QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, biz_com_periods.id odf_pk, biz_com_periods.end_date as end_date, biz_com_periods.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, (CASE WHEN NAMEOPTS.DEFAULTENTITY IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as from_default_entity, odf_ca_fiscaltimeperiod.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_fiscaltimeperiod.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, PERIOD_NAME.name as period_name, biz_com_periods.entity_id as entity_id, odf_ca_fiscaltimeperiod.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, PERIOD_NAME.description as period_description, odf_ca_fiscaltimeperiod.partition_code as partition_code, biz_com_periods.p_year as p_year, biz_com_periods.period_type as period_type, biz_com_periods.start_date as start_date, odf_ca_fiscaltimeperiod.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code , user_context.user_id odf_user_id from biz_com_periods biz_com_periods inner join (select u.id user_id, u.user_name, u.locale, l.language_code from cmn_sec_users u, cmn_languages l where u.language_id = l.id) user_context on user_context.user_id = user_context.user_id JOIN cmn_captions_nls PERIOD_NAME ON PERIOD_NAME.pk_id = biz_com_periods.id and PERIOD_NAME.table_name = 'BIZ_COM_PERIODS' and PERIOD_NAME.language_code = user_context.language_code JOIN entity ENTITY ON ENTITY.id=biz_com_periods.entity_id LEFT OUTER JOIN nameoptions NAMEOPTS ON ENTITY.ENTITY = NAMEOPTS.DEFAULTENTITY JOIN odf_ca_fiscaltimeperiod odf_ca_fiscaltimeperiod ON odf_ca_fiscaltimeperiod.id=biz_com_periods.id where 1 = 1
